short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension based on a joke from the podcast The Greatest Generation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension based on a joke from the podcast The Greatest Generation! This extension replaces some words (for example, beer, enterprise, wife) with fun Greatest Gen words (pod fluid, entrepreneur, she who is wife). 

Hit me up on twitter at @jesuppose if you're a Friend of DeSoto!
